mapper.delete: delete from ujcms_article_custom where exists(select * from ujcms_article t where t.id_ = ujcms_article_custom.article_id_ and t.channel_id_ = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
delete from ujcms_article_custom where exists(select * from ujcms_article t where t.id_ = ujcms_article_custom.article_id_ and t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_article_custom (id_, article_id_, name_, type_, value_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
